title: Photo Of The Day: May 13, 2009
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: Is it wind? Is it static electricity? Doesn't really matter--this kid's hair is amazing, this portrait is adorable, and most of all we wish we could've spent
contentEncoded:
Is it wind? Is it static electricity? Doesn’t really matter–this kid’s hair is amazing, this portrait is adorable, and most of all we wish we could’ve spent some of these past few days on the playground instead of being cooped up in an office. Thanks to sweetvenus for the submission!

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
